title: PBE
body:
Hey Riot. 
Since I tried to get to the PBE its still tell me from the page this(Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.).... I am level 30 I play League a lot more than usual then Why I cant get to the page ???
please help D:
i went to the PBE FAQ tried to see the problem nothing refreshing the page again and again and nothing
i am doing something wrong please tell me.
thank you.

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  There might be a browser settings issue or extension that is causing your page to load an error.  Try running the page in Incognito Mode or[ clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to fix this up.  Hopefully this will get you to the right page and signed up for PBE!
No this is your issue fix it... I have it to

I'm happy to help if I can!  I recommend trying the steps previously suggested, but any additional detail can help!  Can you provide me with some screenshots of what you're seeing, as well as the URL to the page you're trying to access?
